title: Lumbridge & Draynor Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Lumbridge & Draynor Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in and around Lumbridge, such as Draynor Village, Al Kharid, Dorgesh-Kaan and Zanaris.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lumbridge achievements
For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.
Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Lumbridge, Draynor, Al Kharid, Dorgesh-Kaan and Zanaris
Members Yes
Item reward Ring
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Hatius Cosaintus
Levels required
Total level: 1548
 40  50  72
 70  70  88
 65  70  62
 70  78  70
 52  70  66
 75  50  75
 76  69  70
 70  70
85 287

The Lumbridge & Draynor Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in and around Lumbridge, such as Draynor Village, Al Kharid, Dorgesh-Kaan and Zanaris.

Hatius Cosaintus's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Hatius Cosaintus in Lumbridge, just outside the castle courtyard. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes

Overview[edit | edit source]

The reward can be claimed from Hatius Cosaintus. He is located just outside of Lumbridge Castle.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
15
10
15
15

7
 
98+
Quest Requirements
Cook's Assistant
Rune Mysteries
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Explorer's ring 1
    • 30 casts of Low Level Alchemy per day without runes (does not provide experience, unless used in the Alchemist's Playground in the Mage Training Arena)
    • 50% run energy replenish twice a day
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill 30 or above

  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ↑ 3.0 3.1 59 for ironmen or access to the Ancient Cavern.

Rewards

  • Explorer's ring 2
    • 50% run energy replenish 3 times a day
    • 3 daily teleports to cabbage patch near Falador farm
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill 40 or above
  • Access to Draynor Village wall shortcut

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Additional Requirements

  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Explorer's ring 3
    • 50% run energy replenish 4 times a day
    • Unlimited teleports to cabbage patch near Falador farm
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill 50 or above
  • Access to a shortcut from Lumbridge Swamp to the desert
  • 10% increased experience from Tears of Guthix

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Quest Requirements
All quests[4]
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ↑ 59 for ironmen or access to the Ancient Cavern.
  4. ↑ Skill requirements table does not include requirements for all quests.

Rewards

  • Explorer's ring 4
    • 100% run energy replenish 3 times a day
    • 30 casts of High Level Alchemy per day (does not provide experience, unless used in the Alchemist's Playground in the Mage Training Arena)
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill 70 or above
  • 20% discount on items in the Culinaromancer's Chest
  • Ability to use Fairy rings without the need of a Dramen or Lunar staff
  • Unlocked the 6th slot for blocking Slayer tasks

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Light source
  • Rope if you have not been to the caves already
  • Rune or pure essence
  • Water talisman or tiara, or access to the Abyss
  • Any axe
  • Tinderbox
  • Small fishing net
  • Bread dough (consider taking multiple, in case you burn the bread)
  • Any pickaxe

Recommended (not required):

  • Spiny helmet or Slayer helmet for Wall beasts in Lumbridge Swamp Caves
  • Amulet of glory for faster transportation to Draynor
  • 10 coins for the toll gate to Al Kharid from Lumbridge, or completion of Prince Ali Rescue
  • Teleport runes or tabs for Lumbridge
Skills Required
  • 10 Agility
  • 15 Firemaking
  • 15 Fishing
  • 15 Mining
  • 5 Runecraft
  • 7 Slayer
  • 15 Woodcutting
Quests Required
  • Rune Mysteries
  • Cook's Assistant
Task Requirements
1. Complete a lap of the Draynor Village Rooftop Course.
  • 10 Agility
2. Slay a cave bug in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves.
  • 7 Slayer
  • Light source, and a rope if the caves haven't been entered yet
3. Have Archmage Sedridor teleport you to the Rune essence mine.
  • Completion of Rune Mysteries
4. Craft some water runes.
  • 5 Runecraft
  • Rune or pure essence, and access to the Water Altar (water talisman, water tiara or the Abyss)
5. Learn your age from Hans in Lumbridge. None
6. Pickpocket a man or woman in Lumbridge. None
7. Chop and burn some oak logs in Lumbridge.
  • 15 Woodcutting and 15 Firemaking
  • Any axe and tinderbox
8. Kill a zombie in the Draynor Sewers. None
9. Catch some anchovies in Al-Kharid.
  • 15 Fishing
  • Small fishing net
10. Bake some bread on the Lumbridge castle kitchen range.
  • Completion of Cook's Assistant
  • Bread dough
11. Mine some iron ore at the Al-Kharid mine.
  • 15 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
12. Enter the H.A.M. Hideout. None

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Explorer's ring 1
    • 30 casts of Low Level Alchemy per day without runes (does not provide experience, unless used in the Alchemist's Playground in the Mage Training Arena)
    • 50% run energy replenish twice a day
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill 30 or above

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any crossbow
  • Mith grapple
  • 75 steel arrows
  • 999 coins or Ava's attractor
  • Dramen staff or Lunar staff
  • Earth runes
  • Runes to cast Lumbridge Teleport
  • Fly fishing rod
  • Feathers
  • Leather
  • Needle
  • Thread
  • Any axe
  • Butterfly net
  • Impling jar
  • Fire talisman or tiara, or access to the Abyss
  • Earth talisman
  • 2 pure essence
  • Magic Imbue if not using earth talisman
Skills Required
  • 20 Agility
  • 70 Combat level
  • 38 Crafting
  • 30 Fishing
  • 42/50 Hunter
  • 31 Magic
  • 50 Ranged
  • 23 Runecraft
  • 19 Strength
  • 38 Thieving
  • 36 Woodcutting(boostable)[?]
Quests Required
  • Animal Magnetism
    • The Restless Ghost
    • Ernest the Chicken
    • Priest in Peril
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
    • Fairytale I - Growing Pains
      • Lost City
      • Nature Spirit
Task Requirements
1. Complete a lap of the Al Kharid Rooftop Course.
  • 20 Agility
2. Grapple across the River Lum.
  • 8 Agility, 19 and 37
  • Mith grapple and any crossbow
3. Purchase an upgraded device from Ava.
  • Completion of Animal Magnetism
  • 50 Ranged(not boostable)
  • 75 steel arrows, and 999 coins or Ava's attractor
4. Travel to the Wizards' Tower by Fairy ring (dis).
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
  • Dramen or Lunar staff
5. Cast the Lumbridge Teleport spell.
  • 31 Magic and means to cast Lumbridge Teleport (3 1 1 )
6. Catch some salmon in Lumbridge.
  • 30 Fishing
  • Fly fishing rod and some feathers
7. Craft a coif (not cowl) in the Lumbridge cow pen.
  • 38 Crafting
  • Leather, needle and thread
8. Chop some willow logs in Draynor Village.
  • 30 Woodcutting
  • Any axe
9. Pickpocket Martin the Master Gardener.
  • 38 Thieving
10. Get a Slayer task from Chaeldar.
  • Completion of Lost City
  • 70 Combat level
  • Dramen or Lunar staff.
11. Catch an essence or eclectic impling in Puro-Puro.
  • Completion of Lost City
  • 42 Hunter
  • Dramen or Lunar staff, butterfly net and an impling jar
12. Craft some lava runes at the Fire Altar in Al Kharid.
  • 23 Runecraft
  • Access to the Fire Altar (fire talisman or tiara, or the Abyss), earth talisman, earth runes, and pure essence
  • Recommended: Binding necklace

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Explorer's ring 2
    • 50% run energy replenish 3 times a day
    • Three daily teleports to cabbage patch near Falador farm
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill 40 or above
  • Access to Draynor Village wall shortcut

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 130,000 coins
  • Bones
  • 1 cosmic rune
  • 2 nature runes
  • 4 water runes
  • 14 earth runes
  • 28 pure essence
  • Cosmic tiara
  • Any axe
  • Belladonna seed
  • Seed dibber
  • Spade
  • Rake
  • Tinderbox
  • Mining helmet
  • Gold bar
  • Diamond (cut)
  • Amulet mould
  • Ball of wool

Recommended (not required)

  • Games necklace and a Ring of dueling for quick teleportation
  • High amount of Quest points
Skills Required
  • 46 Agility
  • 70 Crafting (boostable)
  • 63 Farming
  • 65 Firemaking
  • 60 Magic
  • 52 Prayer
  • 59 Runecraft (boostable)
  • 57 Woodcutting
Quests Required
  • Tears of Guthix
  • Another Slice of H.A.M.
    • The Giant Dwarf
    • The Dig Site
    • Druidic Ritual
    • Death to the Dorgeshuun
      • The Lost Tribe
      • Goblin Diplomacy
      • Rune Mysteries
  • Recipe for Disaster
    • Cook's Assistant
    • Fishing Contest
    • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
    • Murder Mystery
    • Witch's House
    • Gertrude's Cat
    • Nature Spirit
      • Priest in Peril
      • The Restless Ghost
    • Shadow of the Storm
      • Demon Slayer
      • The Golem
    • Started Legends' Quest
      • Family Crest
      • Waterfall Quest
      • Heroes' Quest
        • Shield of Arrav
        • Lost City
        • Merlin's Crystal
        • Dragon Slayer I
      • Shilo Village
        • Jungle Potion
      • Underground Pass
        • Biohazard
          • Plague City
    • Monkey Madness I
      • The Grand Tree
      • Tree Gnome Village
    • Desert Treasure
      • Temple of Ikov
      • The Tourist Trap
      • Troll Stronghold
        • Death Plateau
    • Horror from the Deep
      • Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl
Task Requirements
1. Cast Bones to Peaches in Al Kharid Palace.
  • Access to Bones to Peaches via the Mage Training Arena
  • 60 Magic
  • Bones and means to cast the spell ( 4 4 2 ).
2. Squeeze past the jutting wall on your way to the Cosmic Altar.
  • Completion of Lost City
  • 46 Agility
  • Dramen or Lunar staff, or access to the Abyss
3. Craft 56 cosmic runes simultaneously from essence.
  • Completion of Lost City
  • 59 Runecraft
  • 28 pure or daeyalt essence, and a cosmic tiara or access to the Abyss
4. Travel from Lumbridge to Edgeville on a waka canoe.
  • 57 Woodcutting
  • Any axe
5. Collect at least 100 Tears of Guthix in one visit.
  • Completion of Tears of Guthix and at least about 150 Quest Points
  • Recommended: Games necklace for quick access
6. Take the train from Dorgesh-Kaan to Keldagrim.
  • Completion of Another Slice of H.A.M.
7. Purchase some Barrows gloves from the Culinaromancer's Chest.
  • Full completion of Recipe for Disaster
  • 130,000 coins
8. Pick some belladonna from the farming patch at Draynor Manor.
  • 63 Farming
  • Belladonna seed, seed dibber, spade, rake and any gloves
9. Light your mining helmet in the Lumbridge Castle basement.
  • 65 Firemaking
  • Tinderbox and mining helmet
10. Recharge your prayer at Duel Arena with Smite activated.
  • 52 Prayer
11. Craft, string and enchant an amulet of power in Lumbridge (not upstairs in castle).
  • 70 Crafting and 57 Magic
  • Gold bar, cut diamond, amulet mould, ball of wool, one cosmic rune and 10 earth runes

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Explorer's ring 3
    • 50% run energy replenish 4 times a day
    • Unlimited teleports to cabbage patch near Falador farm
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill 50 or above
  • Access to a shortcut from Lumbridge Swamp to the desert
  • 10% increased experience from Tears of Guthix

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Quest point cape
  • Lockpick
  • Mith grapple
  • Hammer
  • Water tiara
  • 5 adamantite bars
  • 28 rune essence or pure essence
  • Any axe
  • Any crossbow
Skills Required
  • 70 Agility
  • 70 Ranged
  • 76 Runecraft
  • 88 Smithing
  • 70 Strength
  • 78 Thieving
  • 75 Woodcutting
Quests Required
  • All quests
Task Requirements
1. Steal from a Dorgesh-Kaan rich chest.
  • Completion of Death to the Dorgeshuun
  • 78 Thieving
  • Lockpick
2. Pickpocket Movario on the Dorgesh-Kaan Agility Course.
  • Completion of Death to the Dorgeshuun and Temple of Ikov
  • 42 Thieving, 70 Agility, 70 Ranged and 70 Strength
  • Any crossbow, a mith grapple and a light source
3. Chop some magic logs at the Mage Training Arena.
  • 75 Woodcutting
  • Any axe
4. Smith an adamant platebody down in Draynor Sewer.
  • 88 Smithing
  • 5 adamantite bars and a hammer
5. Craft 140 or more water runes at once from essence.
  • 76 Runecraft
  • 28 rune, pure, or daeyalt essence, and a water tiara or access to the Abyss
6. Perform the Quest point cape emote in the Wise Old Man's house.
  • Completion of all quests
  • Quest point cape

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Explorer's ring 4
    • 100% run energy replenish 3 times a day
    • 30 casts of High Level Alchemy per day (does not provide experience, unless used in the Alchemist's Playground in the Mage Training Arena)
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill 70 or above
  • 20% discount on items in the Culinaromancer's Chest
  • Ability to use Fairy rings without the need of a Dramen or Lunar staff
  • Unlocked the 6th slot for blocking Slayer tasks

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence.

8 October 2015
(update)
  • Pickpocketing a woman in Lumbridge now correctly completes the achievement diary task.
  • Having Sedridor teleport you to the Essence mine now consistently completes the achievement diary task.
23 April 2015
(update | poll)

Completing the elite Lumbridge & Draynor achievement diary now allows use of fairy rings without equipping a staff

Perform the [[Quest point cape]] emote in the [[Wise Old Man]]'s house. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of all quests *[[Quest point cape]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Explorer's ring 4]] **100% run energy replenish 3 times a day **30 casts of [[High Level Alchemy]] per day (does not provide experience, unless used in the [[Alchemist's Playground]] in the [[Mage Training Arena]]) *[[Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill 70 or above *20% discount on items in the [[Culinaromancer's Chest]] *Ability to use [[Fairy rings]] without the need of a [[Dramen staff|Dramen]] or [[Lunar staff]] *Unlocked the 6th slot for blocking [[Slayer task]]s ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 14 April 2021 |update = Below Ice Mountain |change = All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence. }} {{Subject changes |date = 8 October 2015 |update = Smoke Battlestaff Buff |change = *Pickpocketing a woman in Lumbridge now correctly completes the achievement diary task. *Having Sedridor teleport you to the Essence mine now consistently completes the achievement diary task. }} {{Subject changes |date = 23 April 2015 |update = Crystal Halberd Special & More |poll = Old School Content Poll 32: Resizable Mode |change = Completing the elite Lumbridge & Draynor achievement diary now allows use of fairy rings without equipping a staff }} {{Subject changes footer}} {{Achievement diary}}
